500: There are no Fiware Orion instance to fulfill the request.
404: The resource (entity, subscription, etc.) referred in the request has not been found.
400: The resource (file) reffered in the request is not valid
501: The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.
428: They headers resource (Fiware-Service, Fiware-ServicePath, X-Auth-Token) was not found
401: The request has not been applied because it lacks valid authentication credentials for the target resource.
